message.body: My roommate needs to get pushed off a cliff.
why?!
Cuz she's being a immature little hoe bag
hahaha, how so?
She's convinced that no one on the floor likes her
is that true?
To an extent, but she's just being super super childish and it's annoying.
She's always convinced that we're plotting against her.
ugh. that's the worst
Yes man, but I'm avoiding her by volunteering lol
what's the deal with this essay thing that's listed in our hw?
Sorry iphone has been acting weird. I think it's just a personal narrative with the new vocab
did she talk about it in class? i totally don't remember.
Nah she didn't but when I translated it that's what I understood from it
Wait so the test is tomorrow?
i really think it's wednesday
Ok good, cuz I remember her saying, shanice and naveed are tryna give me a heart attack
right!
Are you gonna study?
uhhh yes
hahaha awkward that girl with the bangs is convinced that our test is today. i'll see you on Wednesday, i think.
Was it?
no idea. i left before class started.
Why did you leave?
because i was ridiculously unprepared for the test and just overall not in the mood.
Yeah I just emailed her. I honesty remember her saying it was weds.
on ll it says it says today
Feel better tho!!!
hahaha, thanksss.
I felt like poo, sniffling and cramping so I had breakfast with shanice (who didn't go either) and saved worms from being stomped on in the street so tht made me feel better lol
Just saw that, she posted it yesterday. Poooop.
Dd you get the email?
just now, yeah. fuuu
I thought we were allowed two absences
but the missed test changes things, i think.
Fuck shanice and I are gonna call her and see what's up
plz let me know how that goes!
She didn't really answer the question. But she said we need to come and take the test and if we have a excuse to bring it.
okay, that's acceptable. thanks!
I'm gonna go at like 3
i have class 2:00 to 4:30 monday/wednesday so i'll have to go at 5 or so on wednesday...
Think I might go later than 3 but idk she didn't clearly answer our questions so I'm gonna go
So I just took the test.
The vocab is shorter but you deff need to know the days of the week, how to say reading, writing, the UN, employee, plural for friends and students, hobies, and activities from the vocab.
you're the best, thank you!
The first sentence was like the students don't like listening to long lectures and oh yeah one of em was like her mother used to be an employee at the U so conjugate kana.
thanks!
You're welcome! Good luck!
hey, were the numbers on the test?
No
